chinese: n.歌词；抒情诗 ad）。（供）吟唱的
english: lyric

chinese: 他写下了在弹吉他时想到的歌词。
english: He wrote down the lyrics that came to his mind when he was playing the guitar

chinese: n.评论家
english: critic

chinese: 作为一个严格的美食评论家，我觉得这个比萨还行吧。
english: As a strict food critic, I think the pizza is just so so

chinese: n. 精神創、外
english: trauma

chinese: 士兵们经常会遭受精神创伤。
english: Soldiers often suffer from psychological trauma

chinese: n经理；执行者；行政人员Qd，执行
english: executive

chinese: 双方公司的经理深入地讨论了这个问题。
english: The executives of both companies discussed the issue in depth

chinese: 区扩大；膨胀；详细展开
english: expand

chinese: 我们的业务正在全国范围内扩大。
english: Our business is expanding across the whole country

chinese: adj，语言的，语言上的
english: linguistic

chinese: 西班牙语、法语具有语言上的相似
english: Spanish, and French all have linguistic similarities

chinese: n. 新陈代谢
english: metabolism

chinese: 提高身体的新陈代谢能力有助于减肥。
english: Increasing the metabolism of your body is helpful for weight loss

chinese: adv. 充分地
english: adequately

chinese: 八小时的睡眠能让你得到充分的休息。
english: An eight-hour sleep can make you feel adequately rested

chinese: cdi.额外的，附加的 adv.额外地 12.（报纸）号外
english: extra

chinese: 你能再多给我一点儿冰激凌吗？
english: Could you give me some extra ice cream

chinese: n.节奏；韵律
english: rhythm

chinese: 想玩好这个游戏，他必须要有很强的节奏感。
english: Only with a good sense of rhythm can he play this game well

chinese: 几.后勤，后勤学，物流
english: logistics

chinese: 在古代，要想赢得战争，粮草和其他补给的后勤保障十分重要。
english: In ancient times, the logistics regarding food and supplies were key to winning wars

chinese: U，激励：使有动机；促进；促使；激发・・・・・的极性
english: motivate

chinese: 来自老师的夸赞经常能激励学生。
english: Praise from a teacher can always motivate students

chinese: n.帝王，王权；最高权威；雄伟；壮丽
english: majesty

chinese: 我将永远忠于您，陛下。
english: I'll always be loyal to you, your majesty

chinese: 以 漫游：蜿蜒；迷路；离题 D.游荡；闲逛；失散
english: wander

chinese: 这对老夫妇喜欢在林间小路上漫步。
english: The old couple like to wander on the path through the trees

chinese: v.茁壮成长；繁荣，兴旺
english: thrive

chinese: 如果有足够的阳光，植物便会茁壮成长。
english: Plants thrive if they get enough sunlight

chinese: 耕作，种植，栽培
english: cultivate

chinese: 这个农民正在用机器开垦荒地
english: The farmer is using a machine to cultivate the land
